thread.title: Saudis enjoy 'Black Panther' as cinema ban lifts

title: Saudis enjoy 'Black Panther' as cinema ban lifts
text:
Saudis enjoy 'Black Panther' as cinema ban lifts 6:15pm IST - 01:28 
Saudi Arabia launches its first commercial movie theater, ending a 35-year ban on cinemas under a push by the crown prince to modernize the deeply conservative Muslim kingdom. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Saudi Arabia launches its first commercial movie theater, ending a 35-year ban on cinemas under a push by the crown prince to modernize the deeply conservative Muslim kingdom.
